Patterns

  • User login

Images

Use images for informative purposes, not simply for decoration.

  1. Header image

1. Header Image

Certain pages, particularly home pages and landing pages, have space for a header image. Use imagery that is applicable to the rest of the content of the page or product.

Screen size Header dimensions (scaled to width)
Over 1024px (desktop) 1240x430px
769px > 1024px (landscape tablet) 1024x355px
601px > 768px 768x422px
415px > 600px 600x329px
376px > 414px 414x261px
Up to 375px 375x236px
